title: The funniest movie ever
review: The hangover is the funniest movie ever with them going to Las Vegas and it turned into a nightmare. The funniest parts like the tiger in the bathroom and the mattress on top of Ceasers palace it's just an hilarious movie and then when there friend goes missing and they need to find him before his Wendy it's just an incredible movie

title: Best zombie movie
review: This movie had the best actor in brad Pitt and showed how possibly what could happen in a city in a zombie apocalypse. It felt just like a zombie movie needed to be. Seeing him trying to keep his family alive and him running away from hoardes of zombies is what a zombie movie should be

title: Great
review: When I look at this movie this is the movie I most remember Adam Sandler one of his best movies and how he goes from a hockey player to a golf player in the movie is really funny

title: Forgettable
review: As you first watch it. It's a good movie. But after awhile and you look back at all the Spider-Man movies you kinda forget this one. And if I was to pick one to watch I would not pick this one

title: Forgettable
review: This terminator is the most forgettable out of them all there is just no moments that stand out like the first 2 terminators it's just not good there's just not much else to say

title: Best one
review: This was the best one of all the spider mans. It was great how they made a villain spider man and also how you see sandman grow into a creative villain. And the best is the ending when they all fight it's just great

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode IX - The Rise of Skywalker
title: Shaky ending
review: It was a pretty decent movie and the ending was good but a little shaky because bringing back palpatine just didn't make sense and how litterally everyone in the world found this mysterious planet in seconds and fame to help but all in all it was a good ending I wouldn't be surprised if they made more Star Wars movies though

title: Great
review: This movie started to get me into space movies and wanted to see more. How every aspect is great and how close they get to dying and coming out of it alive makes this movie great

title: Underrated
review: This movie is the most underrated out of all the terminators it still might be the same concept but it really isn't instead of stopping a certain person it's a thing. A nuke. This movie is good and still a deserving third movie to the first 2 terminators

title: Great
review: This movie started superhero movies for me. The first time seeing this was one of the best things to watch what happens to him and how he adjusts to his powers and uses them well is a great aspect of the movie

title: Just why
review: Why was this made I don't get it was terrible adding a new spider man and actor was just a very bad idea

movie_title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
title: Great
review: This movie is suprisingly funny and it gives a great story. The first 2 hours some people might not like but I still did. But the last 30 minutes is insane with instead of going the depressing way with the murder of Sharon Tate. It went a gruesome and action packed way. This was a great movie

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode VIII - The Last Jedi
title: Kind of bad
review: It was cool the see Luke again but what happens after is either boring or just bad up until the end and why things just don't tie in with the story it's just ridiclous the only good is the fights are cool

title: Good
review: This movie is in Thailand now and it's still funny as it was. The funny parts like stu getting mike Tyson's face tattoo and them going through to figure out what happened the night before. There is so many funny moments again and the only problem is it's the same thing but that's still fine

movie_title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
title: Very funny
review: This movie is one of the most funniest movies I've seen. Will Ferrell still is very funny and brings the movie to life. Some scenes from this movie you will just remember for a long time

title: Very funny
review: This movie is very funny because of how they make a water boy turn into a football star. This movie also has some moments where you remember for awhile

title: Great horror movie
review: After I watched this movie it really made me get into horror movies and it was such a creative movie. To have people go insane and make a day all about killing makes this movie cool

title: Wrapping it up
review: It wraps up the trilogy nicely and it still has some of those funny moments and some of those are ridiculously stupid.But it's nice to see everyone together trying to get to Chow and to take him down
